website_summaries.verdict: A simple calendar that's a great size for the desk.
pros: Made from 100% recycled paper with soy ink
The size provides lots of writing room
Big enough to read from across the room: 22 by 17 inches, with 3-inch by 2.1-inch boxes for each day
cons: Binding may wear down over time

customer_reviews.title: Size is great and perfect for me to write down my daily ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got my calender yesterday and as I was going through it, I realized I don't have March printed out in it. I have all the other months except March. Size is great and perfect for me to write down my daily schedules. I'm keeping it, but a heads up to the company incase they printed a lot of these with no March!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2018 Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 90 y.o. mom, bold lettering, a lot of room to write:)
customer_reviews.author: paula ann Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Meets our family needs
customer_reviews.text: Meets our family needs. Put magnets on the the back and placed it on the side of the refrigerator, gives us a calendar we can glace at in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Lray

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if I would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: Not the best desk calendar. It is very thin and cheap. However if you don’t care then this will do fine. Very light weight very cheap construction very easily to rip paper but then again it’s also extremely cheap to buy. Not sure if I would Buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a combination of calendar and blotter, the latter to protect any surface from staining in case of an ink spill. I wanted something eco-friendly and cost-effective. This product is the perfect fit. Great quality. I love the 12-month calendar across the top of each month's page. I'll be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Disneyluvver

customer_reviews.title: Thought I loved this calendar
customer_reviews.text: Thought I loved this calendar. Ordered in Jan 2018 and have used it daily. Flipped to October today to make an entry and - there is no October! There are TWO November's. Quality control??!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read words, large boxes for dates. Doesn't have holes punched in top.
customer_reviews.text: It is a desk calendar. My only complaint is that it did not come with holes punched in the top like the other brands that I have purchased in prior years (I use ours as a kitchen calendar and hang it on the wall).
customer_reviews.author: Erik --

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sized calendar with lots of writing room
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this calendar. It is big enough to write down several events on one day without having to squint to read it.
customer_reviews.author: jenn364

customer_reviews.title: not very perforated
customer_reviews.text: I like that the boxes are nice and big to write out the schedule, but the papers are not perforated well so ripping them out is so difficult! I also wished the paper was a little thicker.
customer_reviews.author: yS

customer_reviews.title: very useful, i would suggest making one with a plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: very useful, i would suggest making one with a plastic cover to protect the sheets from food and other things
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big with great block spaces for appointments
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big with great block spaces for appointments, etc have to a friend who has sight impairment and he loves how big and clear everything is
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these. It's a useful product
customer_reviews.text: I love these. It's a useful product. I've never had a problem with them.
customer_reviews.author: honest_man

customer_reviews.title: I like to have a few calendars around me
customer_reviews.text: This size Calendar is a priority in my office ... I like to have a few calendars around me, but this one allows for memos that are close by at all times.
customer_reviews.author: New York Rican Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I was looking for. Good size and quality of paper is good.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Moorhead

customer_reviews.title: Very good standard desk calendar.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a desk calendar, and this fits the bill. The dates are legible and ample space for each day.
customer_reviews.author: Patfromchicago

customer_reviews.title: Great Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Great price for full size desk calendars. Been buying these awhile. Never disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sad it was missing holes to hang on wall otherwise perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Large enough to see across the room and plenty of room to write appt. times in.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Missing a month
customer_reviews.text: I loved it until this month when I tore off September to see November and no October..
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Large blocks allow me to make notes on the calendar and it helps me stay organized.
customer_reviews.author: OuOkie

customer_reviews.title: No October- November printed twice
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was good until I started adding things to my calendar for the fall and found out it didn’t print October and instead printed November two months in a row!!! Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I purchase every year and paper is nice without a lot of pictures and clutter
customer_reviews.author: groovy girl

customer_reviews.title: TEAM DOFAT:  We would buy these again.  This item met our expectations.
customer_reviews.text: TEAM DOFAT: We would buy these again. This item met our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: TEAM DOFAT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i purchased for my parents so they can keep track of day to day appointments. very helpful
customer_reviews.author: MARK E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I buy this calendar every year for my husbands desk.
customer_reviews.author: Helen A.

customer_reviews.title: THE MONTH OF OCTOBER IS MISSING
customer_reviews.text: Just went to write an appointment down for October and THERE IS NO OCTOBER. There are TWO NOVEMBERS, BUT OCTOBER IS A MYSTERY. NEVER AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: TMS

customer_reviews.title: Huge Calendar
customer_reviews.text: I love this calendar. We put it in the kitchen to remember birthdays, important days, etc. The boxes are big enough to write in
customer_reviews.author: Conscious

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Love the boxes and being able to write it them
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: clear dates and room to write messages in the blocks
customer_reviews.author: April Carrell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was the perfect size for my Dad who has trouble seeing small print!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a calendar, what much can i say. Works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: William B Pawlowski

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Just as described and useful. The case is a bit flimsy, and I was hoping to use it for multiple years. Not sure that it will work. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: ArmyMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look of the phone. The telephone booth looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: House of Doolittle 2018 Monthly Desk Pad Calendar, Classic, 22 x 17 Inches, January - December (HOD150-18)
product_meta.description: Since 1919, House of Doolittle has manufactured quality dated products made in the United States that help you be more productive during your daily planning activities. Thirty-one years ago we made the commitment to produce all of our products using recycled paper and materials. This House of Doolittle monthly desk pad calendar starts in January 2018 and goes through December 2018. It features a strong glue bound leatherette core at the top and includes two chipboard reinforced leatherette corners at the bottom to keep pages in place. Each page is perforated at the top for easy tear-off as needed. This desk pad calendar features Julian dates and days remaining, full year reference calendar on each page, and lightly ruled daily blocks. It is perfect for any office desk, teacher's desk or student's desk. Other products from House of Doolittle include desk pads, wall calendars, lesson planners, class record books, assignment books, monthly appointment planners and weekly appointment planners. Go Green with House of Doolittle products, as we use 100% recycled paper containing 100% post-consumer waste with soy-based inks. All of our products are manufactured in the USA and are FSC certified. Since 1989 House of Doolittle has donated 5% of its profits to organizations that are working to create a more sustainable environment.
feature_bullets: January 2018 - December 2018 calendar, featuring 12 months for easy planning
Full monthly view on each page, featuring 3" x 2.1" blocks allocated for each day
Each monthly calendar page contains a full 12-month calendar at the top for longer term planning
Pages are bound and perforated at the top with blue leatherette binding and matching reinforced corners for durability throughout the Year; perforated pages for easy removal
Printed with High quality soy-based inks on 100% post-consumer recycled paper which is FSC certified and made in the USA

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars126 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
